app.name: WakeMii
app.long_description:
It's an alarm clock app for the Wii which allows you to drop a bunch of "albums" and "hourly" MP3 files with each album also allowing cover-art. It can also be used as a niche MP3 player with features such as prev/next track/album or random play.
Check https://github.com/emukidid/wakemii for usage instructions.
